title: Drawing, "Design for Two Pendants and Two Pins", ca. 1960–65
medium: Pen and blue ink, graphite, ballpoint pen on wove paper
signed: Lower right in black ink: Elsa Freund
inscribed: Left center in black ink: "This is a rather large stone / I can make a smaller one if you wish"; At right in blue ink: "*2 1/2 inches"; At lower left in black ink: "* Please excuse the rough sketches!!"; At lower right in blue ink: "This is more / like my white / bracelet."; At lower center in black ink: "*Discriptive [sic] drawings for customer."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Two Pendants and Two Pins", ca. 1960–65.
ca. 1960–65. Pen and blue ink, graphite, ballpoint pen on wove paper. Gift of Elsa Freund. 1992-107-2.
